channel.title: When is the Apocalypse - new forum threads
channel.description: Threads in forums of the site "When is the Apocalypse" - The Hundred Year Prophesy: 1916 - 2016

item.title: The Apocalypse is Now!
item.content:encoded: According to the Bible, the apocalypse has not started yet. It will start after very strong earthquake on the territory of our Georgia.
